member.name: T:LINQ.Program
member.summary: This program uses System.CommandLine.DragonFruit to accept command line arguments from command line. Execute: dotnet run --region "HelloWorld" to see the output

member.name: M:LINQ.Program.Main(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String[])

Takes in the --package option from the code fence options in markdown
Takes in the --project option from the code fence options in markdown
Takes in any additional arguments passed in the code fence options in markdown
